problem.markdown:
>>What is the most abundant gas in our atmosphere?<< [[argon, carbon dioxide, hydrogen, (nitrogen), oxygen]]
[explanation] At 78%, nitrogen is the most abundant element in the atmosphere. The second most abundant gas is oxygen which comprises 21% of the atmosphere. [explanation]
